trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Tecumseh
There was one other sighting in Tecumseh on or around January 12th 2010
Summary: My son took telescope outside after seeing two objects in the sky. They are in the eastern sky. They are both moving slowly and the colors are bright and changing.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy son went out with his telescope to set it up because it is a clear night to do some star gazing. As he was setting up, he noticed two bright objects in the sky. They are in the eastern sky. Not close to each other at all. They can be seen with the naked eye. Looking in the telescope you can see that the objects are in the shape of a circle. The one on the right is much larger than the other one. They appear to be moving but at a very slow rate. They are rapidly changing colors. This has been ongoing for about 30 minutes now and my son is still outside watching them through the telescope.
